factions.title: Aliens
factions.description: Return minions to their owners' hands, gain victory points instantly, and manipulate bases.

deck.description: Aliens love to mess with people, and they love to mess with other players even more. From bouncing minions back to players' hands, to replacing bases in play, aliens are out to have a great time, at any planet's expense.

minions.name: Supreme Overlord
minions.ability: You may return a minion to its owner's hand.

minions.name: Invader
minions.ability: Gain 1 VP.

minions.name: Scout
minions.ability: Special: After this base is scored, you may place this minion into your hand instead of the discard pile.

minions.name: Collector
minions.ability: You may return a minion of power 3 or less on this base to its owner's hand.

actions.name: Abduction
actions.ability: Return a minion to its owner's hand. Play an extra minion.

actions.name: Beam Up
actions.ability: Return a minion to its owner's hand.

actions.name: Crop Circles
actions.ability: Choose a base. Return each minion on that base to its owner's hand.

actions.name: Disintegrator
actions.ability: Place a minion of power 3 or less on the botton of its owner's deck.

actions.name: Invasion
actions.ability: Move a minion to another base.

actions.name: Jammed Signal
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: All players ignore this base's ability.

actions.name: Probe
actions.ability: Look at another player's hand and choose a minion in it. That player discards that minion.

actions.name: Terraforming
actions.ability: Search the base deck for a base. Swap it with a base in play (discard all actions attached to it). Shuffle the base deck. You may play an extra minion on the new base.

factions.title: Dinosaurs
factions.description: Play high-powered minions and actions with some protection and destruction.

deck.description: If there's one thing dinosaurs know how to do... actually, with a brain the size of a walnut, they don't really know how to do anything. But they are big. And holy cats! someone gave them lasers!

minions.name: King Rex
minions.ability: (no ability)

minions.name: Laseratops
minions.ability: Destroy a minion of power 2 or less on this base.

minions.name: Armor Stego
minions.ability: Ongoing: Has +2 power during other players' turns.

minions.name: War Raptor
minions.ability: Ongoing: Gains +1 power for each War Raptor on this base (including this one).

actions.name: Augmentation
actions.ability: One minion gains +4 power until the end of your turn.

actions.name: Howl
actions.ability: Each of your minions gains +1 power until the end of your turn.

actions.name: Natural Selection
actions.ability: Choose one of your minions on a base. Destroy a minion there with less power than yours.

actions.name: Rampage
actions.ability: Reduce the breakpoint of a base by the power of one of your minions on that base until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Survival of the Fittest
actions.ability: Destroy the lowest-power minion (you choose in case of a tie) on each base with a higher-power minion.

actions.name: Tooth and Claw... and Guns
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: If an ability would affect this minion, destroy this card and the ability does not affect this minion.

actions.name: Upgrade
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +2 power.

actions.name: Wildlife Preserve
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here are not affected by other players' actions.

factions.title: Ninjas
factions.description: Destroy minions and sneak onto bases at the last second using special abilities.

deck.description: If you can see a ninja, chances are you're already dead (and if you can see them while dead, skip ahead to the zombie section). I don't want to give away the secrets or anything, but most of what this faction does is sneaky, happens fast, and at the last second. So look out for that.

minions.name: Ninja Master
minions.ability: You may destroy a minion on this base.

minions.name: Tiger Assassin
minions.ability: You may destroy a minion of power 3 or less on this base.

minions.name: Shinobi
minions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, you may play this minion there. You can only use one Shinobi's ability per base.

minions.name: Ninja Acolyte
minions.ability: Special: On your turn, if you have not yet played a minion, you may return this minion to your hand and play an extra minion on this base.

actions.name: Assassination
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: Destroy this minion at the end of the turn.

actions.name: Disguise
actions.ability: Choose one or two of your minions on one base. Play an equal number of extra minions there, and return the chosen minions to your hand.

actions.name: Hidden Ninja
actions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, play a minion there.

actions.name: Infiltrate
actions.ability: Play on a base. Destroy an action that has been played here. Ongoing: You may ignore this base's ability until the start of your next turn.

actions.name: Poison
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Destroy any number of actions on it. Ongoing: This minion has -4 power. (Minions have minimum power of 0).

actions.name: Seeing Stars
actions.ability: Destroy a minion of power 3 or less.

actions.name: Smoke Bomb
actions.ability: Play on one of your minions. Ongoing: This minion is not affected by other players' actions. Destroy this card at the start of your turn.

actions.name: Way of Deception
actions.ability: Move one of your minions to another base.

factions.title: Pirates
factions.description: Move around from base to base and destroy weak minions.

deck.description: You know what's better than roving the high seas? Roving anywhere you want. Pirates buckle their swashes in every port, and you'll walk the plank if you don't like it.

minions.name: Pirate King
minions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, you may move this minion there.

minions.name: Buccaneer
minions.ability: Special: If this minion would be destroyed, move it to another base instead.

minions.name: Saucy Wench
minions.ability: You may destroy a minion of power 2 or less on this base.

minions.name: First Mate
minions.ability: Special: After this base is scored, you may move this minion to another base instead of the discard pile.

actions.name: Broadside
actions.ability: Destroy all of one player's minions of power 2 or less on a base where you have a minion.

actions.name: Cannon
actions.ability: Destroy up to two minions of power 2 or less.

actions.name: Dinghy
actions.ability: Move up to two of your minions to other bases.

actions.name: Full Sail
actions.ability: Move any number of your minions to other bases. Special: Before a base scores, you may play this card.

actions.name: Powderkeg
actions.ability: Destroy one of your minions and all minions with equal or less power on the same base.

actions.name: Shanghai
actions.ability: Move another player's minion to another base.

actions.name: Sea Dogs
actions.ability: Name a faction. Move all other players' minions of that faction from one base to another.

actions.name: Swashbuckling
actions.ability: Each of your minions gains +1 power until the end of the turn.

factions.title: Robots
factions.description: Play several weak minions in a single turn, often with power bonuses or useful abilities.

deck.description: Captains of industry built the robots, and then the robots took over and made the process even more efficient! Now they can churn out more little, highly specialized bots than their enemies can handle. Oh, and a few massive ones as well....

minions.name: Nukebot
minions.ability: Ongoing: After this minion is destroyed, destroy each other player's minions on this base.

minions.name: Warbot
minions.ability: Ongoing: This minion cannot be destroyed.

minions.name: Hoverbot
minions.ability: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a minion, you may play it as an extra minion. Otherwise, return it to the top of your deck.

minions.name: Zapbot
minions.ability: You may play an extra minion of power 2 or less.

minions.name: Microbot Fixer
minions.ability: If this is the first minion you played this turn, you may play an extra minion. Ongoing: Each of your Microbots gains +1 power.

minions.name: Microbot Guard
minions.ability: Destroy a minion on this base with power less than the number of minions you have here.

minions.name: Microbot Reclaimer
minions.ability: If this is the first minion you played this turn, you may play an extra minion. Shuffle any number of Microbots from your discard pile into your deck.

minions.name: Microbot Alpha
minions.ability: Ongoing: Gains +1 power for each of your other Microbots. All of your minions are considered Microbots.

minions.name: Microbot Archive
minions.ability: Ongoing: After one of your Microbots (including this one) is destroyed, draw a card.

actions.name: Tech Center
actions.ability: Choose a base. Draw one card for each of your minions there.

factions.title: Tricksters
factions.description: Force other players to discard and make bases undesirable to play on.

deck.description: Stealing things, stopping things, starting things, hiding your keys in the morning, collecting underpants for profit... for years, you've thought of these little people as pests. Now they've turned up as pesticide.

minions.name: Leprechaun
minions.ability: Ongoing: After another player plays a minion here with less power than this minion's power, destroy it (resolve its ability first).

minions.name: Brownie
minions.ability: Ongoing: After another player plays a card that affects this minion, that player discards two random cards.

minions.name: Gnome
minions.ability: You may destroy a minion on this base with power less than the number of minions you have here.

minions.name: Gremlin
minions.ability: Ongoing: After this minion is destroyed, draw a card and each other player discards a random card.

actions.name: Block the Path
actions.ability: Play on a base and name a faction. Ongoing: Minions of that faction cannot be played here.

actions.name: Disenchant
actions.ability: Destroy an action that has been played on a minion or base.

actions.name: Enshrouding Mist
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: On your turn, you may play an extra minion here.

actions.name: Flame Trap
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: After another player plays a minion here, destroy it (resolve its ability first) and this card.

actions.name: Hideout
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: If another player's action would affect your minions here, destroy this card and the action does not affect your minions.

actions.name: Mark of Sleep
actions.ability: Choose a player. That player cannot play actions on his or her next turn.

actions.name: Pay the Piper
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: After another player plays a minion here, that player discards a card.

actions.name: Take the Shinies
actions.ability: Each other player discards two random cards.

factions.title: Wizards
factions.description: Draw and play extra cards each turn, especially actions.

deck.description: Presto! Wizards conjure what they need with actions galore. They just keep pulling things out of their hats, so watch their hands. Or their hats... or that big portal to another reality they just opened in your kitchen.

minions.name: Archmage
minions.ability: Ongoing: You may play an extra action on each of your turns.

minions.name: Chronomage
minions.ability: You may play an extra action this turn.

minions.name: Enchantress
minions.ability: Draw a card.

minions.name: Neophyte
minions.ability: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an action, you may place it in your hand or play it as an extra action. Otherwise, return it to the top of your deck.

actions.name: Mass Enchantment
actions.ability: Reveal the top card of each other player's deck. Play one revealed action as an extra action. Return unused cards to the top of their decks.

actions.name: Mystic Studies
actions.ability: Draw two cards.

actions.name: Portal
actions.ability: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Place any number of minions revealed into your hand. Return the other cards to the top of your deck in any order.

actions.name: Sacrifice
actions.ability: Choose one of your minions. Draw cards equal to its power. Destroy that minion.

actions.name: Scry
actions.ability: Search your deck for an action and reveal it to all players. Place it into your hand and shuffle your deck.

actions.name: Summon
actions.ability: Play an extra minion.

actions.name: Time Loop
actions.ability: Play two extra actions.

actions.name: Winds of Change
actions.ability: Shuffle your hand into your deck and draw five cards. You may play an extra action.

factions.title: Zombies
factions.description: Play minions from the discard pile or place them into your deck/hand.

deck.description: 'They're coming to get you, Player 2.' It's hard to keep a good walker down. Zombies just keep coming back, and sometimes they come in waves. Sending zombies to the discard pile isn't 'so long,' it's just 'see you later!'

minions.name: Zombie Lord
minions.ability: You may play an extra minion of power 2 or less from your discard pile on each base where you have no minions.

minions.name: Grave Digger
minions.ability: You may place a minion from your discard pile into your hand.

minions.name: Tenacious Z
minions.ability: Special: During your turn you may play this card from your discard pile as an extra minion. You may only use the ability of one Tenacious Z each turn.

minions.name: Walker
minions.ability: Look at the top card of your deck. Discard it or return it to the top of your deck.

actions.name: Grave Robbing
actions.ability: Place a card from your discard pile into your hand.

actions.name: Lend a Hand
actions.ability: Shuffle any number of cards from your discard pile into your deck.

actions.name: Mall Crawl
actions.ability: Search your deck for any number of cards with the same name and place them into your discard pile. Shuffle your deck.

actions.name: Not Enough Bullets
actions.ability: Place any number of minions with the same name from your discard pile into your hand.

actions.name: Outbreak
actions.ability: Play an extra minion on a base where you have no minions.

actions.name: Overrun
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Other players cannot play minions on this base. Destroy this action at the start of your turn.

actions.name: They Keep Coming
actions.ability: Play an extra minion from your discard pile.

actions.name: They're Coming To Get You
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: On your turn, you may play a minion here from your discard pile instead of from your hand.

factions.title: Bear Cavalry
factions.description: Move and destroy other players' minions on bases you have minions on.

deck.description: The Tsar wasn't satisfied with mere horses. So you're pretty much screwed. You can run away from them. Or you can get killed. Sometimes you get both. Just count yourself lucky that the bears aren't also riding sharks.

minions.name: General Ivan
minions.ability: Ongoing: Your minions cannot be destroyed.

minions.name: Polar Commando
minions.ability: Ongoing: If this is your only minion on this base, it has +2 power and cannot be destroyed.

minions.name: Bear Cavalry
minions.ability: Move another player's minion from here to another base.

minions.name: Cub Scout
minions.ability: Ongoing: After another player's minion moves here, if it has less power than this minion, destroy it.

actions.name: Bear Hug
actions.ability: Each other player destroys his or her minion with the least power (owner chooses in case of ties).

actions.name: Bear Necessities
actions.ability: Destroy an action that has been played on a minion or base.

actions.name: Bear Rides You
actions.ability: Move one of your minions to another base.

actions.name: Commission
actions.ability: Play an extra minion. Then move another player's minion from the extra minion's base to another base.

actions.name: High Ground
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: If you have a minion here, destroy any other player's minion that moves here.

actions.name: Superiority
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here cannot be destroyed, moved, or returned to your hand or deck by other players' cards.

actions.name: You're Pretty Much Borscht
actions.ability: Choose a base where you have a minion. Move all other players' minions from there to one other base.

actions.name: You're Screwed
actions.ability: Choose a base where you have a minion. Move another player's minion from there to another base.

factions.title: Ghosts
factions.description: Can shrink hand size and gains benefits from having 2 or fewer cards in your hand.

deck.description: In that darkest night at the old mansion an eerie light shone through the attic windows... even though no one was home. Ethereal ghosts gain power by having less of the tangible world. The faster you empty your hand, the stronger these spooks become!

minions.name: Spectre
minions.ability: Special: If you have 2 or fewer cards in your hand, any time you can play a minion, you can play this card from your discard pile instead.

minions.name: Haunting
minions.ability: Ongoing: If you have two or fewer cards in your hand, this minion has +3 power and is not affected by other players' cards.

minions.name: Spirit
minions.ability: Choose a minion. You may discard cards equal to its power to destroy it.

minions.name: Ghost
minions.ability: You may discard a card from your hand.

actions.name: Across the Divide
actions.ability: Choose a card name. Place any number of minions with that name from your discard pile into your hand.

actions.name: Door to the Beyond
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: If you have two or fewer cards in your hand, each of your minions here has +2 power.

actions.name: Ghostly Arrival
actions.ability: You may play an extra minion and/or an extra action.

actions.name: Incorporeal
actions.ability: Play on one of your minions. Ongoing: This minion is not affected by other players' cards.

actions.name: Make Contact
actions.ability: You can only play this card if it is the last card in your hand. Play on a minion. Ongoing: Treat this minion as yours while it and this card are in play.

actions.name: Seance
actions.ability: If you have 2 or fewer cards in your hand, draw until you have 5 cards.

actions.name: Shady Deal
actions.ability: If you have two or fewer cards in your hand, gain 1 VP.

actions.name: The Dead Rise
actions.ability: Discard any number of cards. Play an extra minion from your discard pile with power less than the number of cards you discarded.

factions.title: Killer Plants
factions.description: Grow more powerful on bases through multi-turn abilities, and base manipulation.

deck.description: Feed them, Seymour! (Don't do it Seymour!) Because these guys grow all on their own. They become stronger the longer they remain in play, so plants can be a major problem for anyone who came to the table without garden shears.

minions.name: Venus Man Trap
minions.ability: Talent: Search your deck for a minion of power 2 or less and play it here as an extra minion. Shuffle your deck.

minions.name: Weed Eater
minions.ability: This minion has -2 power on the turn you play it.

minions.name: Water Lily
minions.ability: Ongoing: Draw a card at the start of each of your turns. Only use one Water Lily's ability each turn.

minions.name: Sprout
minions.ability: Ongoing: Destroy this card at the start of your turn. You may search your deck for a minion of power 3 or less, and play it here as an extra minion. Shuffle your deck.

actions.name: Blossom
actions.ability: Play up to three extra minions that all have the same name.

actions.name: Budding
actions.ability: Choose a minion in play. Search your deck for a copy of that card and place it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

actions.name: Chokng Vines
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy this minion.

actions.name: Deep Roots
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here cannot be moved or returned to your hand by other players' abilities.

actions.name: Entangled
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Minions may not be moved or returned to hands from any base where you have a minion. Destroy this card at the start of your turn.

actions.name: Insta-Grow
actions.ability: Play an extra minion.

actions.name: Overgrowth
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, reduce the breakpoint of this base to 0.

actions.name: Sleep Spores
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Other players' minions have -1 power here (minimum power 0).

factions.title: Steampunks
factions.description: Play powerful base actions that can be salvaged from the discard pile, and move minions and actions between bases.

deck.description: Jules Verne once said, 'Hey, Steampunks. Nice threads.' Ever since that fateful day, these retronauts have been classing up the joint everywhere they go. Any base in the game will look smarter and be just a bit friendlier for full-on Steampunk domination.

minions.name: Steam Queen
minions.ability: Ongoing: Your actions are not affected by other players' cards.

minions.name: Mechanic
minions.ability: Choose an action in your discard pile that can be played on a base and play it as an extra action.

minions.name: Steam Man
minions.ability: Ongoing: Has +1 power if this base has one of your actions played on it.

minions.name: Captain Ahab
minions.ability: Talent: Move this minion to a base that has one of your actions played on it.

actions.name: Aggromotive
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: If you have a minion here, you have +5 power here.

actions.name: Change of Venue
actions.ability: Place one of your actions that is on a base or minion into your hand. Play it again as an extra action.

actions.name: Difference Engine
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: If you have a minion here, draw an extra card at the end of your turn.

actions.name: Escape Hatch
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: When your minions here are destroyed, place them into your hand instead of the discard pile.

actions.name: Ornate Dome
actions.ability: Play on a base. Destroy all other players' actions played here. Ongoing: Other players cannot play actions on this base.

actions.name: Rotary Slug Thrower
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here each have +2 power.

actions.name: Scrap Diving
actions.ability: Place an action from your discard pile into your hand.

actions.name: Zeppelin
actions.ability: Play on a base. Talent: Move one of your minions from another base to here, or from here to another base.

factions.title: Elder Things
factions.description: This faction gives Madness to other players, and has strong minions that are difficult to play.

deck.description: From reaches beyond space and time come these incredible horrors, bent on... bent on... well we really don't know, do we? Everytime we learn a little bit, we go nuts. Perhaps its the madness they cause that gives them power after all...

minions.name: Elder Thing
minions.ability: Destroy two of your other minions or place this minion on the bottom of your deck. This minion is not affected by opponents' cards.

minions.name: Shoggoth
minions.ability: You can only play this minion on a base where you have at least 6 power. Each other player may draw a Madness card. Destroy a minion here belonging to each player who does not do so.

minions.name: Mi-go
minions.ability: Each other player may draw a Madness card. For each other player that does not, you may draw a card.

minions.name: Byakhee
minions.ability: Each other player with a minion at this base draws a Madness card.

actions.name: Begin the Summoning
actions.ability: Place a minion from your discard pile on top of your deck. You may play an extra action this turn.

actions.name: Dunwich Horror
actions.ability: Play on a minion. This minion gains 5 power. Destroy this minion at the end of the turn.

actions.name: Insanity
actions.ability: Each other player draws two Madness cards.

actions.name: Power of Madness
actions.ability: All other players reveal their hands, discard all Madness cards and then shuffles their discard pile into their deck.

actions.name: Each other player discards cards at random until that player discards a non-Madness card.
actions.ability: Spreading Horror

actions.name: The Price of Power
actions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, all other players with minions there reveal their hand. One of your minions there has +2 power for each Madness card revealed.

actions.name: Touch of Madness
actions.ability: Each other player draws a Madness card. Draw a card and play an extra action this turn.

actions.name: Unfathomable Goals
actions.ability: All other players reveal his or her hands. Each player who reveals a Madness card must destroy one of their minions.

factions.title: Innsmouth
factions.description: Lots of power 2 minions that work together well and can be played in droves.

deck.description: Ah Innsmouth, idyllic little fishing village on the New England coast. Sample their excellent seafood. Become their excellent seafood! That's right, you too can become a fish and live with Dagon below the depths. They may look like simple mutants, but in great numbers and with great power the residents of Innsmouth will welcome you into the fold. Or else.

minions.name: The Locals
minions.ability: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Place any The Locals revealed into your hand. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck.

actions.name: In Plain Sight
actions.ability: Play on a base. Your minions here of power 2 or less are not affected by opponents' cards.

actions.name: Mysteries of the Deep
actions.ability: If you have three or more minions with the same name on a base, draw 3 cards, then you may draw 2 additional cards and 2 Madness cards.

actions.name: New Acolytes
actions.ability: All players shuffle all minions in their discard piles into their decks.

actions.name: Recruitment
actions.ability: Draw up to three Madness cards. For each one drawn, you may play an extra minion this turn.

actions.name: Return to the Sea
actions.ability: Special: After a base scores, put any number of your minions with the same name on that base into your hand instead of the discard pile.

actions.name: Sacred Circle
actions.ability: Play on a base. Talent: You may play an extra minion here with the same name as another minion here.

actions.name: Spreading the Word
actions.ability: Play up to two extra minions with the same name as a minion in play.

actions.name: The Deep Ones
actions.ability: Each of your minions of power 2 or less get +1 power until the end of the turn.

factions.title: Minions of Cthulhu
factions.description: Play lots of actions, recover cards from the discard pile, and slow the game down all the while gaining Madness.

deck.description: Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn! Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn! Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn!

minions.name: Star-Spawn of Cthulhu
minions.ability: Talent: Place a Madness card from your hand into another player's hand.

minions.name: Cthulhu's Chosen
minions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, you may draw a Madness card. This minion gets +2 power until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Servitor of Cthulhu
minions.ability: Talent: Destroy this minion and place an action card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

actions.name: Altar to Cthulhu
actions.ability: Play on a base. Whenever you play a minion here, you may play an extra action that turn.

actions.name: Complete the Ritual
actions.ability: Play on a base where you have at least one minion. At the start of your turn, place all minions and actions on it on the bottom of their owners' decks and swap this base with the top card of the base deck.

actions.name: Corruption
actions.ability: Draw a Madness card. Destroy a minion.

actions.name: Cthulhu Fhtagn
actions.ability: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you have revealed two actions. Place them into your hand and put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck.

actions.name: Furthering the Cause
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: At the end of every turn, if another player's minion here was destroyed, gain 1 VP.

actions.name: It Begins Again
actions.ability: Shuffle any number of actions from your discard pile into your deck.

actions.name: Madness Unleashed
actions.ability: Discard any number of Madness cards. For each one discarded, you may draw a card and play an extra action this turn.

actions.name: Recruit by Force
actions.ability: Place any number of minions of power 3 or less from your discard pile on top of your deck.

actions.name: The Seal is Broken
actions.ability: Draw a Madness card. Gain 1 VP.

actions.name: Whispers in Darkness
actions.ability: Draw a Madness card. You may play two extra actions this turn.

factions.title: Miskatonic University
factions.description: Gain, use, and lose Madness to accomplish a little of everything.

deck.description: Go 'Pods! Go 'Pods! Welcome to your first days at Miskatonic University! We will shape you into a student of the sciences both natural and... otherwise. Certainly our courses seem intense, but there always has to be a small sacrifice for knowledge. 'Ex Ignorantia Ad Sapientiam; E Luce Ad Tenebras.'

minions.name: Professor
minions.ability: Talent: Discard a Madness card. If you do, you may play an extra action and/or an extra minion.

minions.name: Librarian
minions.ability: Talent: Discard a Madness card. If you do, draw a card.

minions.name: Psychologist
minions.ability: You may return a Madness card from your hand or discard pile to the Madness deck.

minions.name: Researcher
minions.ability: You may draw a Madness card.

actions.name: 'Old Man Jenkins!?'
actions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, destroy a minion with the highest power there.

actions.name: ... It Just Might Work
actions.ability: Discard a Madness card to give each of your minions +1 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Field Trip
actions.ability: Place any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck and draw a card for each card you place there.

actions.name: Gate to Beyond
actions.ability: Play on a base. Talent: Draw a Madness card. You may play an extra minion here.

actions.name: Jinkies!
actions.ability: Return up to 2 Madness cards from your hand or discard pile to the Madness deck.

actions.name: That's So Crazy...
actions.ability: Draw a Madness card. Each of your minions has +1 power until the end of the turn. You may play an extra action this turn.

actions.name: Things Best Not Known
actions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, choose a minion there. Draw up to 3 Madness cards. That minion gets +2 power for each Madness card you draw.

actions.name: Those Meddling Kids
actions.ability: Destroy any number of actions played on one base.

factions.title: Cyborg Apes
factions.description: Play lots of actions on minions to power them up.

deck.description: In a daring raid on a top secret research facility, apes stole the latest in cybernetic enhancements, and are now enacting their centuries-old plan to take over the world! Combining their natural athleticism and powerful strength with high-tech augmentations, these apes will go bananas all over your opponents!

minions.name: Cyberback
minions.ability: Ongoing: You may play actions onto this minion from your discard pile instead of from your hand.

minions.name: Clyde 2.0
minions.ability: Ongoing: If your actions played on minions here go to the discard pile, you may place them into your hand instead.

minions.name: Baboom
minions.ability: Talent: Play an action on this minion as an extra action.

minions.name: Furious George
minions.ability: Ongoing: Has +1 power for each action played on it.

actions.name: Cyberevolution
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +3 power.

actions.name: Flying Monkey
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Special: After this base scores, you may move this minion to another base instead of the discard pile. Destroy this action.

actions.name: Going Bananas
actions.ability: Choose a base. Destroy other players' actions played on that base and on minions there.

actions.name: Juiced Up
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +2 power for each action on it (including this one).

actions.name: Missing Uplink
actions.ability: Play on your minion. Ongoing: Draw an additional card at the end of your turn.

actions.name: Monkey On Your Back
actions.ability: Play on your minion. Talent: Destroy another player's minion here of power 4 or less. Place this card on the bottom of your deck.

actions.name: Monkey See, Monkey Do
actions.ability: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Place any number of actions revealed into your hand. Shuffle the rest into your deck.

actions.name: Shielding
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion and other actions on it are not affected by other players' actions.

factions.title: Shapeshifters
factions.description: Copy other players' power and abilities, destroy and replace minions.

deck.description: Far below the surface of the earth, strange amorphous creatures have developed a thriving world, based on the manipulation of their own genetics. Now they plan to apply that knowledge to conquer our world above. Taking samples of the most powerful creatures and warriors they can find, these shapeshifters can use the best of whoever they copy.

minions.name: Doppelganger
minions.ability: Special: When this minion goes to the discard pile from a base, search your deck for a minion and play it as an extra minion. Shuffle your deck.

minions.name: G.E.L.F.
minions.ability: Talent: Search your deck for a non-G.E.L.F. minion of power 4 or less. Shuffle this minion into your deck and play that minion here as an extra minion.

minions.name: Mimic
minions.ability: Ongoing: This minion's power is equal to the highest power printed on a minion card in play.

minions.name: Copycat
minions.ability: Choose another player's minion in play. This card has the same ability as that minion until the end of the turn.

actions.name: ... Really?
actions.ability: Destroy one of your minions. Play an extra minion from your discard pile with the same or lower power.

actions.name: Bacta the Future
actions.ability: Destroy a minion. That minion's owner may immediately play an extra minion.

actions.name: Cellular Bonding
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Choose an action on a minion. Ongoing: This card has the abilities of the chosen action.

actions.name: Genetic Shift
actions.ability: Either each of your minions gets +1 power until the end of the turn, or one of your minions gets +3 power until the end of the turn, your choice.

actions.name: Mitosis
actions.ability: Choose your minion in play. Play a copy of that card from your hand as an extra minion.

actions.name: Shell Game
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion cannot be destroyed.

actions.name: Splice as Nice
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +2 power.

actions.name: Transmogrify
actions.ability: Destroy one of your minions. Search your deck for a minion with the same or lower power and play it as an extra minion. Shuffle your deck.

factions.title: Super Spies
factions.description: Sabotage other players' hands and deck while improving yours, and play specials while bases are scoring.

deck.description: The shadow war between International Secret Intelligence and the evil HAVOC (Henchman and Villains of Chaos) continues. HAVOC's schemes threaten the world, from weather-changing satellites to lasers mounted on secret moon bases, they can only be opposed by the daring agents of the ISI. Using the latest in espionage technology, the ISI will be able to foil your opponents plans.

minions.name: Secret Agent
minions.ability: Ongoing: After another player plays an action, he or she must discard a card.

minions.name: Mole
minions.ability: Ongoing: Before this base scores, you may play an action as a Special action.

minions.name: Operative
minions.ability: Reveal the top card of each player's deck. Place any of those cards on the bottom of their owner's deck. Return the other cards to the top of their decks.

minions.name: Spy
minions.ability: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Place them on the top and/or bottom of your deck in any order.

actions.name: Discards Are Forever
actions.ability: All players reveal cards from their decks until they reveal a minion. Discard all revealed cards.

actions.name: For My Eyes Only
actions.ability: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Place them on the top and/or bottom of your deck in any order.

actions.name: From Q With Love
actions.ability: Draw three cards. Discard two cards.

actions.name: Live and Let Chum
actions.ability: Special: Play before a base scores. Destroy a minion of power 3 or less there.

actions.name: Mindraker
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Other players cannot play Specials while this base is scoring.

actions.name: Permit to Kill
actions.ability: Each other player reveals the top two cards of his or her deck and discards any minions revealed. Return the other cards on the top of the deck in any order.

actions.name: The Base is Not Enough
actions.ability: Special: Play before a base scores. Choose a minion there of power 4 or less. You control that minion until the end of the turn.

actions.name: The Spy Who Ditched Me
actions.ability: All other players must discard a minion or reveal their hand to show they have no minions.

factions.title: Time Travelers
factions.description: Replay actions and minions, and avoid the discard pile by placing cards in your hand or the bottom of the your deck.

deck.description: The time stream has been compromised. Robots from the future mingle with pirates, extinct dinosaurs move with magical wizards... everything is all smashed up! That's where the Time Patrol steps in. Organized in 1976 and led by the enigmatic Doctor When, the Time Patrol works to keep time flowing... in the manner they deem best.

minions.name: Doctor When
minions.ability: You may return another of your minions in play to your hand. You may play it again as an extra minion.

minions.name: Repeater Perfect
minions.ability: Place an action from your discard pile on top of your deck.

minions.name: Time Raider
minions.ability: Talent: Place a card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck.

minions.name: Jumper
minions.ability: Ongoing: When this minion goes to the discard pile (from play), you may place it back into your hand.

actions.name: 1.21 Gigawatts
actions.ability: Shuffle all actions or all minions from your discard pile into your deck.

actions.name: Do Over!
actions.ability: Return your minion from a base to your hand. You may play it again as an extra minion.

actions.name: Into the Time Slip
actions.ability: Return a card in play to its owner's hand.

actions.name: It's Astounding
actions.ability: Play an action from your discard pile as an extra action.

actions.name: Statis Field
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: This base cannot score. Destroy this action at the start of your turn.

actions.name: Time is Fleeting
actions.ability: Play after a base scores if there is a base in the discard pile. Add a base of your choice from the discard pile instead of drawing a new base from the base deck.

actions.name: Time Walk
actions.ability: You may play an extra minion and an extra action this turn. Draw 2 cards. Place this card on the bottom of your deck instead of your discard pile.

actions.name: Wormhole
actions.ability: Special: Play after a base scores. Shuffle your minions there into your deck instead of placing them in the discard pile.

factions.title: Geeks
factions.description: Interrupt other players' turns to disrupt their plans.

deck.description: Geeks are, well... Geeks! Slightly eccentric individuals with intellectual pursuits! They can also be thoughtful and tricky! You may also spot a couple of famous tabletop Geeks' in there. Say hello and play them at least once!

minions.name: Felicia Day
minions.ability: Move all minions to this base.

minions.name: Wil Wheaton
minions.ability: Special: You may play this minion when an opponent plays an action. Discard that action; it has no effect.

minions.name: Game Guru
minions.ability: Ongoing: This minion is not affected by other players' abilities.

minions.name: Fan
minions.ability: Special: On your turn, you may discard this card from your hand to draw a card.

actions.name: Banned List
actions.ability: For each other player, name a card and look at that player's hand. They must place any copies of that card from their hand on the bottom of their deck.

actions.name: Control Minion
actions.ability: Choose a minion. You control that minion until the end of the turn. Special: Play when another player plays a minion. You gain control of that minion until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Cosplay
actions.ability: Special: Play when you gain 1 or more VP. Gain an additional 1 VP.

actions.name: Force of Wil
actions.ability: Special: Play when an opponent plays an action. Discard that action; it has no effect.

actions.name: Griefer
actions.ability: Choose one effect for each other player: That player discards a random card, or destroys one of his or her minions, or shuffles his or her discard pile into his or her deck.

actions.name: Min-Maxing
actions.ability: Look at an opponent's hand. You may play an action from that opponent's hand as an extra action.

actions.name: Mulligan
actions.ability: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may draw them and shuffle the rest of your hand into your deck.

actions.name: Non-Infinite Loop
actions.ability: Choose an action in your hand. Play it as an extra action, then you may put it back into your hand instead of the discard pile.

factions.title: Giant Ants
factions.description: Weak minions with lots of +1 power counters that can flexibly move and allocate them.

deck.description: The future of atomic energy was never supposed to have this disastrous effect! Mutant ants spill out from giant hills, intent on destroying our homes and all else that stands in their colony's way! The ants work as a great hive mind, spreading their power around as necessary to ensure their atomic-age victory!

minions.name: Killer Queen
minions.ability: Talent: If you played another minion here this turn, place a +1 power counter on this minion and that minion.

minions.name: Drone
minions.ability: Place a +1 power counter on this minion. Ongoing: Before one of your minions is destroyed, you may remove a +1 power counter from this minion to prevent the destruction.
Place two +1 power counters on this minion. Talent: Transfer a +1 power counter from this minion to another minion.

minions.name: Worker
minions.ability: Place two +1 power counters on this minion.

actions.name: A Kind of Magic
actions.ability: Transfer any or all of your +1 power counters among your minions.

actions.name: Gimme the Prize
actions.ability: Place a +1 power counter on up to 3 of your minions.

actions.name: Headlong
actions.ability: Move one of your minions to another base. Place two +1 power counters on that minion.

actions.name: The Show Must Go On
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here with +1 power counters are not affected by other players' cards.

actions.name: Under Pressure
actions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, you may transfer any number of +1 power counters from one of your minions to another.

actions.name: We Are the Champions
actions.ability: Special: After this base scores, transfer any or all +1 power counters from one of your minions here to another minion.

actions.name: We Will Rock You
actions.ability: Each of your minions gains +1 power for each +1 power counter on it until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Who Wants to Live Forever?
actions.ability: Remove any number of +1 power counters from your minions. Draw a card for each counter removed.

factions.title: Mad Scientists
factions.description: Play lots of +1 power counters, and gain bonuses for removing +1 power counters.

deck.description: Working in the lab, late one night, my eyes beheld an eerie sight. For my monster from his slab, began to rise. And suddenly to my surprise, he did the Smash... Up. The Mad Scientists, intent on unlocking the mysteries of life, have instead released death in the form of powerful creations! Their toying with nature can empower various minions, but at what cost? (Apologies to Bobby Pickett)

minions.name: Herr Doktor
minions.ability: Talent: Place a +1 power counter on another one of your minions.

minions.name: The Monster
minions.ability: Talent: Remove a +1 power counter from this minion to play an extra minion.

minions.name: Lab Assistant
minions.ability: Place a +1 power counter on another one of your minions.

minions.name: Igor
minions.ability: Ongoing: After this minion is destroyed or discarded, place a +1 power counter on one of your minions.

actions.name: Angry Mob
actions.ability: Choose one of your minions. Place any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck. For each card you placed there, place a +1 power counter on that minion.

actions.name: Blitzed
actions.ability: Remove any number of +1 power counters from your minions. Destroy a minion with power less than or equal to the number of counters you removed.

actions.name: Body Shop
actions.ability: Destroy one of your minions. Place a number of +1 power counters equal to that minion's power, split any way you choose, on your minions.

actions.name: German Engineering
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: After you play a minion here, place a +1 power counter on it.

actions.name: Grave Situation
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: After one of your minions is destroyed here, place it into your hand instead of the discard pile.

actions.name: IT'S ALIVE!
actions.ability: Play an extra minion. Place a +1 power counter on it.

actions.name: Jolt
actions.ability: Place a +1 power counter on each of your minions.

actions.name: Uberserum
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, place a +1 power counter on this minion. This minion cannot be destroyed.

factions.title: Vampires
factions.description: Destroy your and others' minions to gain power counters.

deck.description: From the dark gothic recesses of ancient brooding castles, draped in black velvet, and probably listening to Bauhaus, the children of the night come to drink deep from Smash Up! Draining the very life from their victims, these cursed souls will gain power upon destroying your opponents' minions.

minions.name: The Count
minions.ability: Ongoing: After another player's minion is destroyed, place a +1 power counter on this minion.

minions.name: Nightstalker
minions.ability: Destroy a minion of power 2 or less here to place a +1 power counter on this minion.

minions.name: Heavy Drinker
minions.ability: You may destroy one of your minions to place a +1 power counter on this minion.

minions.name: Fledgling Vampire
minions.ability: After you play this minion, if another player has more power here than you do, place a +1 power counter on this minion.

actions.name: Big Gulp
actions.ability: Destroy a minion of power 4 or less.

actions.name: Buffet
actions.ability: Special: Play after a base scores. If you were the winner, place a +1 power counter on each of your minions.

actions.name: Crack of Dusk
actions.ability: Play a minion of power 2 or less from your discard pile as an extra minion. Place a +1 power counter on it.

actions.name: Cull the Weak
actions.ability: Choose your minion. Discard any number of minion cards from your hand. For each minion discarded, place a +1 power counter on that minion.

actions.name: Dinner Date
actions.ability: Place a +1 power counter on your minion. Destroy a minion of power 2 or less at that minion's base.

actions.name: Mad Monster Party
actions.ability: Place a +1 power counter on each of your minions that does not have one.

actions.name: Opportunist
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: After another player's minion is destroyed, place a +1 power counter on this minion.

actions.name: Summon Wolves
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, place a +1 power counter on this card. If you have a minion here, counters on this card add to your power total.

factions.title: Werewolves
factions.description: Strong minions with temporary power bursts, bonuses based on power, and destruction.

deck.description: From howling at the moon, to cowing their pack, or ripping through town, the werewolves are here to assert their place as the alphas of Smash Up. Using their explosive power to beat down opponents, the werewolves will not relent in their drive to hunt and dominate all that stand against them.

minions.name: Pack Alpha
minions.ability: Special: Before this base scores, each of your minions here gains +1 power until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Loup-Garou
minions.ability: Special: Before this base scores, this minion gains +2 power until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Teenage Wolf
minions.ability: Talent: This minion gains +1 power until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Howler
minions.ability: This minion gains +2 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Chew Toy
actions.ability: Choose one of your minions. Destroy a minion with lower power at your minion's base.

actions.name: Frenzy
actions.ability: Each of your minions with power 4 or more gains +1 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Full Moon
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Each of your minions here has +1 power.

actions.name: Leader of the Pack
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Talent: If this minion has the highest power here, you may play an extra action.

actions.name: Let the Dog Out
actions.ability: Choose one of your minions. Destroy any number of minions at your minion's base whose total power is less than or equal to your minion's power.

actions.name: Marking Territory
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if you have more total power here than each other player, reduce this base's breakpoint to zero.

actions.name: Moontouched
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Talent: If this minion has the highest power here, draw a card.

actions.name: Unstoppable
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion cannot be destroyed.

factions.title: Fairies
factions.description: Choose between effects and counter actions played on minions and bases.

deck.description: From deep in the magical glades come these little sprites, bringing magical wishes and pixie dust to your plans for world domination. Don't judge them by their size. The Fairies' magic gives you great options in how to deal with your enemies.

minions.name: Titania
minions.ability: Return an opponent's minion to its owner's hand, OR play an extra minion.

minions.name: Glymmer
minions.ability: Talent: Until the start of your next turn, either another minion has -4 power (minimum power 0), OR this minion has +1 power.

minions.name: Puck
minions.ability: Play an extra action OR draw a card.

minions.name: Tinx
minions.ability: You may transfer an action played on another minion to this one.

actions.name: Daisy Chain
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: If you control this minion it has +2 power, otherwise it has -2 power.

actions.name: Enchantment
actions.ability: Play on a base and choose one: Ongoing: All minions here have +1 power. OR Ongoing: All minions here have -1 power.

actions.name: Fairy Ballet
actions.ability: Draw two cards, OR draw a card and play an extra action.

actions.name: Ladybug
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion cannot be destroyed. Talent: Transfer this action to another minion.

actions.name: Leaf Armor
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +1 power. Talent: Transfer this action to another minion.

actions.name: Magic Acorns
actions.ability: Each other player discards a card at random, OR you draw a card and play an extra action.

actions.name: Magic Ward
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Other players cannot play actions on this base or on minions here.

actions.name: Playful Tricks
actions.ability: Destroy up to 2 actions played on minions and/or bases.

factions.title: Kitty Cats
factions.description: Temporarily take control of other players' minions, and destroy minions you control.

deck.description: Can haz base? Kitty Cats have the power to compel those of weak will to do what they wish... and the power to have billions of internet memes. Perhaps those are the key? Either way, the Kitty Cats will use their alluring power to dominate the fight at any base. Then head out for a night of jazzy music in the alleys!

minions.name: Queen Fluffy
minions.ability: Talent: Take control of a minion of power 3 or less until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Whiskers
minions.ability: Talent: Play an extra action. Destroy one of your minions.

minions.name: Muffin
minions.ability: Take control of a minion of power 3 or less until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Mr. Grumpers
minions.ability: Choose a minion. It has -2 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Can Has Cheeseburger?
actions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, take control of a minion there, of power 3 or less, until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Cat Fight
actions.ability: Choose one of your minions. Draw cards equal to that minion's power. Destroy that minion.

actions.name: Cat's Paw
actions.ability: Take control of a minion of power 5 or less until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Grumpiness
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has -2 power.

actions.name: Hang in There
actions.ability: Play on one of your minions. Ongoing: If this minion would be destroyed, move it to another base and destroy this action instead.

actions.name: Hissy Fit
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: All other players' minions here have -1 power.

actions.name: Invisible Bicycle
actions.ability: Choose a base. Move any number of minions of power 2 or less from there to another base.

actions.name: Nine Lives
actions.ability: Destroy one of your minions. Play an extra minion.

factions.title: Mythic Horses
factions.description: Play multiple minions in a turn with bonuses for having multiple minions on the same base.

deck.description: The power of togetherness shows through in Horses, whose mighty herds race across the land, trampling any who stand in their way. Not only normal horses, but pegasi, sea-horses and more will join the fight for the base! Remember that friendship is... smashable!

minions.name: Starlyte
minions.ability: Ongoing: This minion has +1 power for each of your other minions here.

minions.name: Rainbow
minions.ability: Talent: If you have played another minion here, draw a card.

minions.name: Seastar
minions.ability: If you play this minion on a base where you have another minion, you can play an extra minion this turn. Only use one Seastar's ability each turn.

minions.name: Pinkie
minions.ability: Ongoing: While another of your minions is here, this minion has +1 power.

actions.name: Adventure Power
actions.ability: Choose a base. Move any number of your minions to it.

actions.name: Encouragement Power
actions.ability: Play on one of your minions. Ongoing: This minion has +1 power for each of your other minions here.

actions.name: Freedom Power
actions.ability: Destroy an action played on a minion or base.

actions.name: Friendship Power
actions.ability: Move one of your minions to a base where you have a minion. You may place this action into your hand instead of the discard pile.

actions.name: Sharing Power
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if you have 2 or more minions here, draw a card.

actions.name: Super Future Space Armor Power
actions.ability: Each of your minions that is on a base with another of your minions gains +2 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Teaching Power
actions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, reveal one card from your deck for each of your minions there. Play one minion you reveal as an extra minion there. Return the rest of the cards to the top of the deck in any order.

actions.name: Togetherness Power
actions.ability: Play an extra minion at a base where you have a minion.

factions.title: Princesses
factions.description: A few power 5 minions with powerful talents and abilities, and a diverse assortment of supporting actions.

deck.description: Dream a dream of ruling over your enemies! Princesses will make every wish come true through the power of pure love and happiness. Which can be used, oddly, to order everyone about, and even destroy your enemies. Don't be fooled: these innocent-looking beauties are few in number, but royal, strong and determined!

minions.name: Apricot
minions.ability: Talent: Destroy another player's minion of power 2 or less here.

minions.name: Eliza
minions.ability: Ongoing: Other players cannot play more than one extra card per turn.

minions.name: Griselda
minions.ability: Talent: Place an Heirloom card from your discard pile into your hand.

minions.name: Marie DeGraw
minions.ability: Talent: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a minion, draw it. Otherwise, place it on the bottom of your deck.

minions.name: Sleeping Beauty
minions.ability: Ongoing: If this minion would go to the discard pile, shuffle it into your deck instead.

minions.name: Snow White
minions.ability: Talent: Move a minion from another base to here.

actions.name: Direct to DVD Sequel
actions.ability: Shuffle a minion from your discard pile into your deck and draw a card.

actions.name: Fairy Godmother
actions.ability: Draw a card, OR one minion gets +2 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Happily Ever After
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: If you are the winner here when this base scores, gain 1 VP.

actions.name: Heirloom
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This card gives this minion +1 power for each Heirloom on it. This card cannot be destroyed.

actions.name: Skillet
actions.ability: Destroy a minion of power 2 or less and draw a card.

actions.name: Some Day My Prince Will Come
actions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, move a minion from there to another base.

actions.name: Tale as Old as Time
actions.ability: Choose a base. Move all of your minions to it.

actions.name: True Love's Kiss
actions.ability: Move a minion to another base.

actions.name: Woodland Helpers
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: After you play an action, you may place it on the bottom of your deck instead of in your discard pile.

factions.title: Clerics
factions.description: Return cards from the discard pile and prevent cards from going to the discard pile.

deck.description: Munchkin Clerics are here to spread the holy word ... and do some smiting while they're at it! They've got blessings for you and curses for your opponents, all for a low, low tithe!

minions.name: Cardinal
minions.ability: Talent: If your discard pile has at least five cards, place two of them, chosen at random, into your hand.

minions.name: Deep Friar
minions.ability: Special: After this base scores, you may move another one of your minions here to another base instead of the discard pile.

minions.name: Turner
minions.ability: Destroy an undead monster here OR shuffle a random minion from your discard pile into your deck.

minions.name: Holy Roller
minions.ability: You may shuffle a card from your discard pile into your deck.

actions.name: Bin and Gone
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: After another base scores, you may move one of your minions from there to here instead of the discard pile.

actions.name: Collection Plate
actions.ability: Place two random cards from your discard pile into your hand.

actions.name: Curse of Imprisonment
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion loses its abilities.

actions.name: Curse of Uselessness
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion adds no power to the base it is on.

actions.name: Good Habits
actions.ability: All minions gain +1 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Join the Club
actions.ability: Choose a base. All minions there get +1 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Remove Curse
actions.ability: Destroy an action on a base or on a minion.

actions.name: Word of Recall
actions.ability: Choose a random action from each other player's discard pile. You may play one of them as an extra action. Return the others.

factions.title: Dwarves
factions.description: Gain and play treasures to boost the power of your minions.

deck.description: Digging underground for most of their lives gives them a sensitivity to light, especially the light glinting off a piece of treasure! It also gives them impressive muscles. The last place you want to be is between a Munchkin Dwarf, his pickaxe, and some treasure.

minions.name: Dwarf King
minions.ability: Ongoing: When a treasure card on one of your minions goes to the discard pile, place it into your hand instead.

minions.name: Loot Lover
minions.ability: Ongoing: This minion has +2 power for each treasure card on it.

minions.name: Gold Digger
minions.ability: Talent: Place a treasure card from the discard pile into your hand.

minions.name: Gem Grabber
minions.ability: Ongoing: If this minion has a treasure card on it, it has +2 power.

actions.name: Anything for Money
actions.ability: Discard any number of cards. Draw one treasure card for each card you discarded.

actions.name: Cash Out
actions.ability: Play up to 3 treasure cards from your hand as extra cards.

actions.name: Cunning Plan
actions.ability: Special: Play before a base scores. Draw a treasure card. You may play it.

actions.name: Greed is Good
actions.ability: Draw a treasure card OR place a treasure card from the discard pile into your hand. You may play an extra action.

actions.name: Hidden Assets
actions.ability: Place the top 3 cards from the treasure card deck into its discard pile. Draw a card. You may play an extra action.

actions.name: Mine!
actions.ability: Search the treasure deck for a card that can be played on a minion. Play it on one of your minions as an extra action. Shuffle the treasure deck.

actions.name: No! My Precious!
actions.ability: Destroy an action played on a minion. If it is a treasure card, you may play an extra action.

actions.name: Salvage
actions.ability: Special: Play before a base scores. Play a treasure card from the discard pile onto one of your minions there.

factions.title: Elves
factions.description: Help other players to indirectly help yourself at the right moment.

deck.description: Munchkin Elves want everyone to live in harmony, and they'll bash whomever they have to over the head to make that happen. Elves are also quite happy to help you ... and help themselves, while they're at it.

minions.name: Fae Fighter
minions.ability: Ongoing: After another player plays a minion, you may place a +1 power counter on it to place a +1 power counter on one of your minions here.

minions.name: Lord of the Prance
minions.ability: Talent: Another player of your choice draws a card. Draw a card.

minions.name: Flower Child
minions.ability: You may give another player control of this minion until it leaves play, to take control of one of that player's minions of power 3 or less until it leaves play.

minions.name: Elf Help Guru
minions.ability: Talent: Give all other players' minions here +1 power each until the end of the turn.

actions.name: After You
actions.ability: Each other player draws a card. Draw a card for each player in the game, including yourself.

actions.name: Dancing Root
actions.ability: All players shuffle their discard piles into their decks. Draw a card.

actions.name: Helping Hands
actions.ability: Special: Play before a base scores if you have a minion there. Choose another player. That player gets +2 total power; your minion gets -2 power (minimum 0). If that player is the winner, you get one of that player's VPs.

actions.name: Pumping Iron
actions.ability: Choose another player. That player chooses a minion to gain +2 power until the end of the turn. You choose a minion to get +3 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Run Away!
actions.ability: Special: Play before a base scores if you have a minion there. Move one of your minions and another player's minion from there to another base.

actions.name: Run Away More!
actions.ability: Special: Play before a base scores. Move any number of your minions from that base to another base.

actions.name: Trade
actions.ability: Draw a random card from another player's hand and place it in yours, then place this card in that player's hand. You may play an extra action this turn.

actions.name: Traveling Elf
actions.ability: Play on one of your minions. Talent: Move this minion to another base.

factions.title: Halflings
factions.description: Draw many minions, play many minions and put minions on top of your deck.

deck.description: It's hard to tell if you're up to your knees in children or Munchkin Halflings. A stabbing feeling in your thigh and the faint smell of sausage almost definitely means Halflings. They get everywhere and they just keep coming!

minions.name: Shire Marshal
minions.ability: Talent: Play an extra minion on a base where another player has more power than you.

minions.name: Pestling
minions.ability: You may play an extra minion here.

minions.name: Bardling
minions.ability: If another player has more power here than you, you may play an extra minion here.

minions.name: Quarterling
minions.ability: If this is your only minion here, you may play an extra minion on this base.

actions.name: Last Call
actions.ability: Special: Play before a base scores. Play a minion there. Cancel that minion's ability until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Lunch Run
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: After each time you play a minion here, draw a card.

actions.name: Out of Nowhere!
actions.ability: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until two minions have been revealed. Place those minions into your hand. Shuffle the rest of the cards back into your deck.

actions.name: Rude Awakening
actions.ability: Choose a base. Reveal your hand and play all minions in it onto that base as extra minions; cancel their abilities until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Small But Tough
actions.ability: Play on your minion. Ongoing: When this minion goes to the discard pile, place it on top of your deck instead.

actions.name: Sneaksy
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here are not affected by other players' actions.

actions.name: Spoiled Brats
actions.ability: Choose any number of minions from your discard pile, shuffle them, and place them on top of your deck.

actions.name: Unexpected Party
actions.ability: Play an extra minion on a base where you have no minions.

factions.title: Mages
factions.description: Discard cards to gain power, destroy minions, play extra cards, and manipulate monsters.

deck.description: What's better than zapping your enemies with lightning from your fingertips? Summoning something else to do it for you! Munchkin Mages are great at distracting their foes by dropping monsters on their heads. Surprise!

minions.name: Blaster Master
minions.ability: Talent: Discard a card to destroy a minion of power 2 or less.

minions.name: Happy Zapper
minions.ability: Talent: Discard a card to give this minion +2 power until the end of the turn. Special: Before this base scores, you may use this minion's talent.

minions.name: Wand Whiz
minions.ability: You may discard a card to play an extra minion or action.

minions.name: Scroll Shuffler
minions.ability: Discard a card. Draw a card.

actions.name: Charm
actions.ability: Take control of a monster and treat it as one of your minions until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Embiggen
actions.ability: Choose a minion. Discard any number of cards. The minion gets +1 power until the end of the turn for each card you discarded.

actions.name: Mass Summoning
actions.ability: Play a monster on each base.

actions.name: Portal to Beyond
actions.ability: Play on a base. Talent: Discard a card to play a monster here.

actions.name: Recover Arcane Wisdom
actions.ability: Draw until you have five cards in your hand.

actions.name: Some Enchanted Evening
actions.ability: Discard any number of cards. Play an extra minion of power 3 or less for each card you discard.

actions.name: Speed Reading
actions.ability: Discard a card. Draw three cards.

actions.name: Zzzzzap!
actions.ability: Discard a card to destroy a minion of power 3 or less.

factions.title: Orcs
factions.description: Brute force against your opponents with bonuses for having more power than others.

deck.description: Birds travel in flocks. Deer travel in herds. Munchkin Orcs travel in hordes! It's hard to beat the overwhelming power of the horde, or the smell. No, really. Don't even try.

minions.name: Sword Lord
minions.ability: Ongoing: Each of your other minions has +1 power.

minions.name: Topper Chopper
minions.ability: Talent: Do nothing.

minions.name: Hammer Slammer
minions.ability: Destroy a minion of power 2 or less.

minions.name: Dork Orc
minions.ability: Ongoing: This minion is not affected by other players' actions.

actions.name: And Stay Down!
actions.ability: Special: Play before a base scores. If you have the highest total power here, other players cannot play or use Special abilities.

actions.name: Angry Pillagers
actions.ability: Special: Play when a base scores. If you have at least 3 more power there than the runner-up, gain 1 VP.

actions.name: Crush
actions.ability: Choose a base and a player who has fewer minions there than you. Destroy one of that player's minions there.

actions.name: Death Breath
actions.ability: Place a minion of power 4 or less on the bottom of its owner's deck.

actions.name: Dogpile
actions.ability: Move one of your minions to a base where you have at least two minions. Special: You may play this before a base scores.

actions.name: Gimme!
actions.ability: Choose an action on a minion. Destroy that minion and transfer the action to one of your minions.

actions.name: Stalling
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Each time another player plays a card, you may choose for your minions here not to be affected by it.

actions.name: Too Tough
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion is not affected by other players' actions.

factions.title: Thieves
factions.description: Steal action cards in play, gain treasures, and sell treasures for VP.

deck.description: Keep your eyes on Munchkin Thieves at all times. The moment you look away, you'll find a dagger in your back and your precious treasures in someone else's back ... pocket!

minions.name: Master Thief
minions.ability: Talent: Draw a treasure card.

minions.name: Fence
minions.ability: You may discard two treasure cards to gain 1 VP.

minions.name: Cat Burglar
minions.ability: Reveal any number of treasure cards from your hand. Place a +1 power counter on this minion for each one you revealed.

minions.name: Pickpocket
minions.ability: If there is another Pickpocket here, draw a treasure card.

actions.name: Backstab
actions.ability: Discard a treasure card to destroy a minion of power 3 or less.

actions.name: Clever Distraction
actions.ability: Special: Play after a base scores, if you have a minion there. The winner loses 1 VP and you gain 1 VP.

actions.name: Mugging
actions.ability: Transfer an action played on a minion to one of your minions.

actions.name: Potion Bandolier
actions.ability: Choose a minion. Discard a treasure card to give that minion +3 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Secret Stash
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: When this base scores, add two treasure cards to the reward.

actions.name: Smuggling
actions.ability: Discard two treasure cards to gain 1 VP. Shuffle your discard pile into your deck. Place this card on the bottom of your deck.

actions.name: Strip Bare
actions.ability: Choose a treasure card in play. Place it into your hand.

actions.name: Swipe
actions.ability: Draw a treasure card.

factions.title: Warriors
factions.description: Play and destroy monsters on bases to manipulate the breakpoint and gain treasures.

deck.description: Whether they're from the windswept plains or the noblest castles, mighty Munchkin warriors live to fight! Using their brawn and all things pointy, warriors excel at killing things, especially Monsters.

minions.name: Big Hero
minions.ability: Talent: Destroy a monster here OR play a monster here.

minions.name: Star Player
minions.ability: Ongoing: After a monster is destroyed here, place a +1 power counter on this minion.

minions.name: Beserker
minions.ability: Destroy a monster here with power less than or equal to this minion to place a +1 power counter on this minion.

minions.name: Taunter
minions.ability: You may play a monster here.

actions.name: Campaign
actions.ability: Each of your minions on a base that has a monster gains +2 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Cleave
actions.ability: Destroy a monster. You may play any treasures you get from destroying it as extra cards.

actions.name: Dumbbells
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +3 power.

actions.name: Dungeon Bait
actions.ability: Play a monster on a base OR destroy a minion of power 2 or less.

actions.name: Eternal Hero
actions.ability: Play on one of your minions. Ongoing: When this minion goes to the discard pile, place it and this action into your hand instead.

actions.name: Ruckus
actions.ability: Choose a base. Play two monsters there OR destroy all monsters there but do not collect any treasure cards.

actions.name: Shield of Ubiquity
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +2 power for each monster here.

actions.name: War Cry
actions.ability: Destroy a monster to add its power to a minion at that base until the end of the turn.

factions.title: Dragons
factions.description: Break down bases and make them unattractive for other players with your presence.

deck.description: Here there be Dragons! These massive monstrosities of legend have come to Smash Up, and they took smashing bases literally. They have little time for your opponent's shenanigans, for other factions are crunchy, and taste good with ketchup.

minions.name: Great Wyrm
minions.ability: Ongoing: Other players here are awarded 1 less VP from this base when it scores.

minions.name: Wyvern
minions.ability: Destroy a minion here of power 3 or less. Talent: Reduce the breakpoint of this base by 3 until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Imperial Dragon
minions.ability: Ongoing: After another player plays or moves a minion here, draw a card.

minions.name: Hatchling
minions.ability: Ongoing: After another player plays or moves a minion here, it gets -1 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Bring Down the Walls
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Before this base scores, you may play a minion here.

actions.name: Burn It Down
actions.ability: Destroy a base and any actions played on it. Replace it with the top card of the base deck or a base from the discard pile. All minions from the original base remain.

actions.name: Dangerous Ground
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Other players must discard a card to play a minion here.

actions.name: Dragon Lands
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here have +1 power. Special: Before a base scores, you may play this card there.

actions.name: Flank Attack
actions.ability: Search your deck and/or discard pile for an action that can be played on a base and play it as an extra action. Shuffle your deck if you searched it.

actions.name: Intimidating Presence
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Other players' minions here have -1 power. Special: Before a base scores, you may play this card there.

actions.name: Raze
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: This base's ability is cancelled.

actions.name: Ruins
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Other players here are awarded 1 less VP from this base when it scores.

factions.title: Mythic Greeks
factions.description: Get bonus power from playing the diverse "favors of the gods" (= actions).

deck.description: This is the story of a time long ago - a time of myth and legend. When the ancient gods were petty and cruel, and they plagued mankind with suffering... The ancient gods and heroes of Greek myth have returned, bringing their favors and curses, heroics and bravery to your Base battles!

minions.name: Odysseus
minions.ability: Ongoing: After you play an action, place a +1 power counter on one of your minions.

minions.name: Heracles
minions.ability: Ongoing: After any player plays an action, this minion gains +1 power until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Jason
minions.ability: Ongoing: After the first time you play an action each turn, choose a base. All of your minions there gain +1 power until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Spartan
minions.ability: Ongoing: Place a +1 power counter on this minion after the first time you play an action on your turn.

minions.name: Argonaut
minions.ability: Trigger all abilities that would trigger from you playing an action. Special: Any time you can play an action, you can play this card instead.

actions.name: Favor of Aphrodite
actions.ability: Play an extra minion.

actions.name: Favor of Apollo
actions.ability: Draw a card and play an extra action.

actions.name: Favor of Ares
actions.ability: One of your minions gains +3 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Favor of Athena
actions.ability: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. You may place one of the revealed actions into your hand, and return the rest to the top of your deck in any order.

actions.name: Favor of Dionysus
actions.ability: One of your minions gains +1 power until the end of the turn. Play an extra action. You may place this card on top of your deck instead of the discard pile.

actions.name: Favor of Hades
actions.ability: Place an action card from your discard pile into your hand.

actions.name: Favor of Hera
actions.ability: Place a +1 power counter on up to two of your minions.

actions.name: Favor of Hermes
actions.ability: Play two extra actions.

actions.name: Favor of Poseidon
actions.ability: Shuffle up to three cards from your discard pile into your deck.

actions.name: Favor of Zeus
actions.ability: Reduce the breakpoint of a base by 5 until the end of the turn.

factions.title: Sharks
factions.description: Destroy minions below a certain power to get extra power and extra minion plays.

deck.description: The most perfect killing machines. Predators that have evolved to the apex of their realm. And now they want our realm! Sharks are coming on land to show that they have what it takes to be at the top of the food chain in and out of the water. Just when you thought it was safe to go back to the convenience store...

minions.name: Megalodon
minions.ability: You may destroy a minion of power 4 or less here. Special: Before this base scores, you may destroy a minion here of power 3 or less.

minions.name: Great White
