minions.ability: Talent: Move this minion to another base and destroy a minion there of power 2 or less.

minions.name: Hammerhead
minions.ability: Ongoing: After a minion here is destroyed, place a +1 power counter on this minion.

minions.name: Mako
minions.ability: Special: After you destroy a minion on any base, you may play this minion there as an extra minion.

actions.name: Air Jaws
actions.ability: Move one of your minions to another base, then destroy a minion there of power 3 or less.

actions.name: Blood in the Water
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: After a minion is destroyed here, you may play a minion here of power 3 or less as an extra minion.

actions.name: Chum
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: After a minion is destroyed, place a +1 power counter on this minion.

actions.name: Dangerous Waters
actions.ability: Play on a base. Talent: Choose a minion here. It gets -2 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Feeding Frenzy
actions.ability: Choose a base. Destroy any number of minions there of power 2 or less.

actions.name: Freakin' Laser Beam
actions.ability: Choose one of your minions. Destroy a minion with equal or lower power at your minion's base.

actions.name: Torn Apart
actions.ability: Destroy a minion of power 3 or less and draw a card.

actions.name: Week of Sharks
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: If you have a minion here, draw an extra card at the end of your turn. Only use one Week of Sharks ability each turn.

factions.title: Superheroes
factions.description: Power 2 minions that can directly bring in a diverse crew of power 5 minions.

deck.description: Faster than a speeding bullet. More powerful than an aggromotive. Able to leap tall Nukebots in a single bound... The mighty power of the comic page comes to life! Defeat your arch-nemesis with super strength, speed, and toughness. Then find out who wins the base in the next exciting issue!

minions.name: Awesome Guy
minions.ability: Ongoing: Your minions here cannot be destroyed by other players.

minions.name: Captain Amazing
minions.ability: Talent: Give each of your minions here +1 power until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Mind Lady
minions.ability: Talent: Choose another player's minion. That minion's abilities are cancelled until the start of your next turn.

minions.name: The Burst
minions.ability: Ongoing: After a minion is played on a base, you may move this minion to there.

minions.name: Mild Mannered Citizen
minions.ability: Ongoing: At the start of your turn you may destroy this minion to search your deck for a minion of power 5 or more, play it here as an extra minion, and shuffle your deck.

actions.name: Expanded Power
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +1 power and can't be destroyed by other players.

actions.name: Golden Age
actions.ability: Place up to three minions from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck.

actions.name: Justice Friends
actions.ability: Each of your minions of power 5 or more gains +2 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: My Only Weakness
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion's abilities are cancelled.

actions.name: Not Really Dead
actions.ability: Place up to two minions of power 2 or less from your discard pile into your hand.

actions.name: Radioactive Exposure
actions.ability: Destroy one of your minions to search your deck for a minion with more power, play it there as an extra minion, and shuffle your deck.

actions.name: Secret Base
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here of power 3 or less cannot be destroyed by other players.

actions.name: Sidekick
actions.ability: Choose a base where you have a minion of power 5 or more. Play a minion there of power 2 or less as an extra minion.

factions.title: Tornados
factions.description: Move minions. Move your own minions. Move other players' minions.

deck.description: Ok, yes, we hope you get the obvious joke. But hey, Tornados are pretty awesome in this game (not as much in real life). Get ready to spread minions all over the place with these excellent Shark Delivery Systems(TM).

minions.name: Monster Tornado
minions.ability: Talent: Move a minion of power 4 or less from here to another base, or from another base to here.

minions.name: Cyclone
minions.ability: Talent: Move this minion to another base.

minions.name: Twister
minions.ability: You may move a minion of power 3 or less from here to another base, or from another base to here.

minions.name: Dust Devil
minions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, you may move this minion to there.

actions.name: Carried Away
actions.ability: Move a minion to another base.

actions.name: Gone with the Wind
actions.ability: Special: Play after a base scores. You may move one of your minions from there to another base instead of the discard pile.

actions.name: Not in Kansas
actions.ability: Destroy a base and any actions played on it or on minions there. Replace it with the top card of the base deck. All minions from the original base remain.

actions.name: Over the Rainbow
actions.ability: Special: Play before a base scores. Move one of your minions from another base to there.

actions.name: Picked Up
actions.ability: Special: Play before a base scores. Move a minion from there to another base.

actions.name: Ripped Off
actions.ability: Transfer an action played on a base to another base or on a minion to another minion.

actions.name: Trade Winds
actions.ability: Choose two minions of power 3 or less. Move each one to the other's base.

actions.name: Whirlwinds
actions.ability: You may move any number of your minions to other bases.

factions.title: Astroknights
factions.description: Ten unique minions focus on drawing and playing cards to increase minion power.

deck.description: Quite a while back, in a grouping of stars not close to here, the Astroknights protected the various species of the galaxy! Boosting their strength, speed and skill with the incredible powers of the Fours, they were the equal of armies. But now their time is past, and darkness reigns. Will a rag-tag group of heroes be able to defeat a massive juggernaut of an imperium and restore freedom? Hey, it's a space opera -- of course they will!

minions.name: Space Knight
minions.ability: Talent: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. You may draw one action from the revealed cards. Return the rest in any order.

minions.name: Scoundrel
minions.ability: Talent: Move this minion and another one of your minions here to another base.

minions.name: Space Prince
minions.ability: Talent: Play an extra action that directly increases the power of one of your minions.

minions.name: Walking Carpet
minions.ability: Special: Before this base scores, if you are not winning, you may play an action that directly increases the power of this minion.

minions.name: Alien Guru
minions.ability: Ongoing: Once per turn, after you play an action that directly increases a minion's power, you may also place a +1 power counter on it.

minions.name: Annoying Alien
minions.ability: Talent: Name a minion. All minions here with that name get -2 power until the start of your next turn.

minions.name: Astro Robot
minions.ability: Destroy an action played on this base or on a minion here.

minions.name: Mannersbot
minions.ability: Talent: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an action, draw it, otherwise return it.

minions.name: Pupoks
minions.ability: Talent: Lose 1 VP to reveal the top three cards of your deck and draw them. You may play one of them as an extra card.

minions.name: Ghost Knight
minions.ability: Ongoing: This minion cannot be destroyed. Your other minions here have +2 power.

actions.name: Block the Probe
actions.ability: Choose a minion. It gains +2 power until the end of the turn. Special: You may play this card before a base scores.

actions.name: Hidden Base
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if you have a minion here, draw a card.

actions.name: It's a Trap!
actions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal an action. You may draw it or play it immediately. Shuffle the unused cards into your deck.

actions.name: Laser Sword
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +1 power and is not affected by other players' minions.

actions.name: Prepare for Battle
actions.ability: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Place one into your hand and the other on the bottom of your deck.

actions.name: Recycle the Trash
actions.ability: Shuffle up to two actions from your discard pile into your deck.

actions.name: Use the Fours
actions.ability: One of your minions gains +4 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Yield to Rage
actions.ability: One of your minions gains +2 power until the end of the turn. Play an extra action.

factions.title: Changerbots
factions.description: Mobile faction where minions switch between having higher power or utilizing abillities.

deck.description: Quite a lot more than your eyes first perceive! The Changerbots hail from another world, but secretly move about ours in the form of everyday transportation. They change their form and abilities to fight a never-ending battle against their enemies, and protect the human race from their robotic shenanigans. They are also the subject of an absolutely terrible movie reboot, apparently.

minions.name: Leader Two
minions.ability: Talent: One of your other minions gains +2 power until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Solarshout
minions.ability: Talent: Play an extra action. Give this minion -2 power until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Bruiser
minions.ability: Ongoing: This minion cannot be destroyed. Talent: This minion gains +2 power and loses its Ongoing ability and all other abilities until the start of your next turn.

minions.name: Huffie
minions.ability: Talent: Move this minion to another base and give it -1 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Cesium Armor
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +1 power and cannot be destroyed.

actions.name: Change Into A Gun
actions.ability: Play on one of your minions to destroy a minion of power 4 or less there. Ongoing: This minion has -2 power. Destroy this card at the start of your turn.

actions.name: Change Up and Roll On
actions.ability: Special: Before a base scores you may move any number of your minions to there. They each get -1 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Flighterizer
actions.ability: Play on one of your minions. Ongoing: This minion has the ability: 'Talent: Move this minion to another base and give it -1 power until the end of the turn.'

actions.name: Form Mergacon
actions.ability: Choose a base. Each of your minions there gains +1 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Matrix of Bossiness
actions.ability: Play on one of your minions. Ongoing: This minion's printed power is treated as if it were 5.

actions.name: Passengers
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has the ability: 'Talent: If this minion moved this turn, move another one of your minions from the previous base to here.'

actions.name: The Touch
actions.ability: Play on one of your minions. Ongoing: This minion has the ability: 'Talent: This minion gains +3 power and loses all other abilities until the end of the turn.'

factions.title: Ignobles
factions.description: Give control of your minions to others for benefits, often before taking them back.

deck.description: In the game of kingly seats, you smash the base, or you are destroyed. The Ignobles can be trusted just about as far as you can throw them. Backstabbing, swapping sides, and the occasional party crashing is par for the course for these medieval schemers. Watch out for help offered from one of these untrustworthy types, it will be short lived.

minions.name: Aunt of Drakes
minions.ability: Talent: Give control of one of your minions to another player to draw a card and play an extra action.

minions.name: Foot of the King
minions.ability: Ongoing: At the end of your turn, you may take control of a minion you own.

minions.name: Betrothed
minions.ability: You may give control of this minion to another player. Ongoing: The owner of this minion gains 1 VP if another player wins this base and controls this minion.

minions.name: Sneaky Squire
minions.ability: You may give control of this minion to another player to play an extra minion.

actions.name: Activate the Spy
actions.ability: Take control of a minion you own. Play an extra action.

actions.name: Banner Call
actions.ability: Take control of any number of minions you own.

actions.name: Fate of the Favorites
actions.ability: Each player destroys a minion they own.

actions.name: Hostage Exchange
actions.ability: Give another player control of one of your minions to take control of one of their minions of equal or less power.

actions.name: Inevitable Betrayal
actions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, take control of a minion you own there.

actions.name: Out of Sight
actions.ability: Each player returns a minion they own to their hand.

actions.name: Red Birthday Party
actions.ability: Destroy a minion you own and all minions with less power on the same base.

actions.name: Repaying Debts
actions.ability: Give control of one of your minions to another player to draw two cards and play an extra minion.

factions.title: Star Roamers
factions.description: Cards work together to trigger and manipulate how your minions are affected.

deck.description: These are the travels of the spaceship Undertaking. It's several-year mission: to find new worlds, seek out new life and new attractive green ladies, to bravely go where no person has gone before! The Star Roamers travel about the board, using their incredible teleporting technology to send countless ensigns to their deaths, all in the name of base smashing!

minions.name: Ship's Captain
minions.ability: Search your deck for a minion, reveal it, add it to your hand and shuffle your deck. If it has power 3 or less, play it here as an extra minion.

minions.name: Medical Officer
minions.ability: Ongoing: If another one of your minions would be destroyed, you may return it to its owner's hand instead.

minions.name: Science Officer
minions.ability: Talent: Return one of your minions of power 4 or less to its owner's hand. Play an extra minion with a different name.

minions.name: Ship's Engineer
minions.ability: Ongoing: If another one of your minions would be returned to your hand, you may move it to another base instead.

minions.name: Ensign
minions.ability: Ongoing: When an opponent plays a card that directly affects one of your other minions here, you may have it affect this minion instead.

actions.name: Hyperspeed 10
actions.ability: Choose a base. Move all minions from there to a single other base.

actions.name: Mass Teleport
actions.ability: Each player returns one of their minions to its owner's hand.

actions.name: Port Me Up
actions.ability: Return one of your minions to its owner's hand. Special: You may play this after a base scores; the minion must be on the scoring base.

actions.name: Protector Fields
actions.ability: Play on a base where you have a minion. Ongoing: Your minions here are not affected by other players' cards.

actions.name: Teleport Error
actions.ability: Choose a minion. Move it to another random base.

actions.name: Teleport Overflow
actions.ability: Return one of your minions to its owner's hand. Reveal any number of minions with the same name from your hand, and play them as extra minions.

actions.name: Weird New Worlds
actions.ability: Play the top base from the base deck. Play this card and an extra minion on it. Ongoing: When the next base scores, do not replace it; destroy this card.

actions.name: Whiplash Maneuver
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: If any of your minions on other bases would be returned to your hand, you may move them here instead.

factions.title: Explorers
factions.description: Future base manipulation and knowledge, Move/Play extra minions on new bases to take early leads. move all over the place.

deck.description: This faction doesn't belong in a museum! They belong on bases! The Explorers use their fearless sense of adventure to move quickly onto new bases and establish your power there quickly. By helping you control the flow of bases, they can nearly guarantee fortune and glory... or at least points.

minions.name: Idaho Smith
minions.ability: You may play the top base of the base deck, and move this minion and any number of your other minions from here to there.

minions.name: Guide
minions.ability: Ongoing: After the first time each of your minions moves in a turn it gains +1 power until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Crypt Looter
minions.ability: Special: After a new base comes into play, you may play this minion on it as an extra minion.

minions.name: Glory Hound
minions.ability: Look at the top two cards of the base deck. Place one on the bottom of the deck and the other on the top.

actions.name: Dr Livingstone, I Presume?
actions.ability: Choose a minion. If it is the only minion on its base, shuffle it into its owner's deck.

actions.name: Forgotten Horrors
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: After you play a minion here or play a card that moves your minions to here, draw a card and transfer this action to another base.

actions.name: Fortune and Glory
actions.ability: Choose a base. You may move up to two minions from there to another base.

actions.name: I Said No Camels!
actions.ability: Choose a base. Place a +1 power counter on each of your minions there OR draw a card for each of your minions there.

actions.name: It Belongs in a Museum
actions.ability: Choose two minions on different bases. Move each one to the other's base.

actions.name: Lost City
actions.ability: Special: After a base scores, reveal the top two cards of the base deck. Choose one to replace the scored base and discard the other. Play a minion on the new base as an extra minion.

actions.name: X Never Marks the Spot
actions.ability: Move each of your minions.

actions.name: You Call This Archaeology?
actions.ability: Move one of your minions. Special: You may play this before or after a base scores.

factions.title: Grannies
factions.description: Manipulate your deck, draw/play actions from the top of your deck and draw/play minions from the bottom of your deck.

deck.description: Everybody loves grandma! And grandma loves you, let me find something in my bag here for you... Grannies keep close tabs on the family, even if the family includes dinosaurs or zombies! They always know who is coming and going, and that slight busybody-ness can come in incredibly handy when planning your strategies for smashing bases.

minions.name: Matriarch
minions.ability: Talent: Reveal the bottom two cards of your deck. Draw any minions revealed, and discard the rest.

minions.name: Granny
minions.ability: Talent: Look at the top card of your deck. Place it on the top or bottom of your deck.

minions.name: Nana
minions.ability: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an action, draw it or play it as an extra action. Otherwise place it on the bottom of your deck.

minions.name: Grandma
minions.ability: Look at the top card of your deck. Place it on the top or bottom of your deck.

actions.name: Always Room at Granny's
actions.ability: Special: Play after a base scores. Place up to three of your minions there on the top and/or bottom of your deck in any order.

actions.name: Attic Treasures
actions.ability: Place three cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order. Draw three cards.

actions.name: Chicken Soup
actions.ability: Place up to two cards from your discard pile on the top and/or bottom of your deck.

actions.name: Don't Mess With My Babies!
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here cannot be affected by other players' cards.

actions.name: Family Reunion
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: After you play a minion here, reveal the bottom card of your deck. If it is a minion, draw it, otherwise place it on top of your deck.

actions.name: Granny's Purse
actions.ability: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an action, you may draw it or return it. Otherwise place it on the bottom of you or deck. Play an extra action.

actions.name: Hush, My Stores are On
actions.ability: Reveal the bottom card of your deck and draw it. If it is a minion you may play it as an extra minion.

actions.name: Knitting Circle
actions.ability: Destroy up to three actions played on minions and/or bases. Draw a card for each one destroyed.

factions.title: Rock Stars
factions.description: Collect Groupies and gain advantages from bases with high breakpoints. Play and move many minions at once to break bases.

deck.description: Hello Cleveland! Let's ROCK!!! Rock Stars want to put on the best show for their fans, and sell out the biggest venues. The biggest venues of course being those with the highest breakpoint. Put on a massive concert and focus on those bases for the win.

minions.name: The Monarch
minions.ability: Talent: Search your deck and/or discard pile for a Groupie, reveal it and place it into your hand. Shuffle your deck if you searched it.

minions.name: Classic Rocker
minions.ability: Talent: If this base has a breakpoint of 21 or higher, draw a card. Use only one Classic Rocker ability per turn.

minions.name: Rick Roll
minions.ability: Move up to three of your minions from bases with lower breakpoints to here.

minions.name: Groupie
minions.ability: Play another Groupie here as an extra minion.

actions.name: Guest Star
actions.ability: Search your deck and/or discard pile for a Groupie and reveal it. Place it in your hand or play it as an extra minion. Shuffle your deck if you searched it.

actions.name: Hot Venue
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here have +1 power. If this base has a breakpoint of 21 or higher, draw a card at the end of any turn that you play a minion here.

actions.name: Power Ballad
actions.ability: Choose a base. Your minions there gain +1 power until the end of the turn. Special: If the base has a breakpoint of 21 or higher, you may play this card before the base scores.

actions.name: Reunion Tour
actions.ability: Shuffle any number of your minions from your discard pile into your deck.

actions.name: Rock of Luuv
actions.ability: Search your deck for up to three minions with power 2 or less and the same name. Reveal them, place them into your hand and shuffle your deck.

actions.name: Total Sellout
actions.ability: Special: Play after a base scores where you have a minion. Draw two cards. Draw another card if the breakpoint was 21 or higher.

actions.name: Tour Bus
actions.ability: Choose a base. Move up to three of your minions from bases with lower breakpoint to there.

actions.name: Turn Up to 11
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: If this base's starting breakpoint is less than 21, it is increased to 21.

factions.title: Teddy Bears
factions.description: Low power minions who rise in power to challenge opponents, with actions focused on neutralizing enemy threats and drawing more cards.

deck.description: Who could possibly come between you and your bear when you were little? Nothing. Because those bears had more up their sleeves than you ever knew. Just try looking at their owners the wrong way and you're in trouble. In the sweetest way possible!

minions.name: Sir Squeezes
minions.ability: Play up to three minions of power 3 or less, whose total power is 5 or less, as extra minions here.

minions.name: Fun Bear
minions.ability: Ongoing: After another player plays or moves a minion to here, place a +1 power counter on this minion.

minions.name: Lovey Bear
minions.ability: Ongoing: This minion's starting power is increased to the highest starting power of an opponent's minion here.

minions.name: Snuggly Bear
minions.ability: Special: After you play your first minion in a turn, you may immediately play this minion there as an extra minion.

actions.name: Bear Picnic
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Other players cannot play minions they own of power 2 or less on other bases.

actions.name: Care Package
actions.ability: Draw a card and play an extra minion.

actions.name: Cuddle
actions.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion's abilities are cancelled.

actions.name: Group Hug
actions.ability: Give one of your minions +1 power for each other minion at the same base until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Love Overload
actions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, destroy the minion there with the most power. If tied, destroy all tied minions.

actions.name: Square Deal
actions.ability: Draw cards until at least one player has fewer cards in their hand than you.

actions.name: Tea Party
actions.ability: Play on a base. Talent: If there are two or more minions here and at least one is yours, draw a card.

actions.name: Too Cute
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here cannot be destroyed by other player's cards.

factions.title: Itty Critters
factions.description: Play weak extra minions that go under your deck at the end of the turn.

deck.description: They're tiny, and they come and go quickly, but once you learn which one to call when, the Itty Critters can really pack a punch. We know you'll want to have them all. If you can make these things as popular as certain other things (you know which ones) we'd be eternally grateful.

minions.name: Critter Champion
minions.ability: Talent: Search your deck for a minion of power 2 or less and play it here as an extra minion. If you control it at the end of the turn, place it on the bottom of your deck.

minions.name: Critter Coach
minions.ability: You may search your deck for a minion of power 2 or less and play it here as an extra minion. If you control it at the end of the turn, place it on the bottom of your deck.

minions.name: Calicoin
minions.ability: You may place +1 power counter on another minion here.

minions.name: Flooffairy
minions.ability: You may draw a card.

minions.name: Krakatoad
minions.ability: You may choose another minion here to gain +2 power until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Leafaroo
minions.ability: You may shuffle a card from your discard pile into your deck.

minions.name: Shellshock
minions.ability: You may destroy another minion of power 2 or less here.

minions.name: Tadpour
minions.ability: You may move another minion from here to another base.

actions.name: Coach Combat
actions.ability: Choose one of your minions. Destroy a minion with lower power at its base.

actions.name: Critter Cube
actions.ability: Choose a minion in play of power 3 or less, owned by any player, and shuffle it into your deck.

actions.name: Evolution
actions.ability: Choose one of your minions. Destroy it to either play Rainboroc there, or search your deck for a minion with up to 1 more power and play it there as an extra minion.

actions.name: Gotta Get 'Em All
actions.ability: Shuffle one of each minion with different name from your discard pile into your deck.

actions.name: I Select You!
actions.ability: Search your deck for a minion of power 3 or less and play it as an extra minion. If you control it at the end the turn, place it on the bottom of your deck.

actions.name: Ittypedia
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: After you play a minion here, it gains +1 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Recall Critter
actions.ability: Play a minion of power 2 or less from your discard pile as an extra minion. If you control it at the end of the turn, place it on the bottom of your deck.

actions.name: Super Effective!
actions.ability: Destroy an action on a minion or on a base.

titan.name: Rainboroc
titan.ability: Special: After you win a base while this card is not in play, you may play it on the base that replaces it. Ongoing: After the first time each turn you play a minion here of power 2 or less, place a +1 power counter on this card. Talent: Shuffle a minion with power 2 or less from your discard pile into your deck. If you do, you may move this card to another base.

factions.title: Kaiju
factions.description: Gain power through your base actions and destroy other players' cards.

deck.description: Giant monsters stomp around Tokyo, smashing countless buildings as they battle. Their amazing destructive power confounds scientists, whose greatest weaponry proves useless against them. Who can stop the massive power of a guy in a rubber suit? We know! We'll let the precocious 10-year-old, with unexplained access to the Japanese military's most secure facilities, talk to it!

minions.name: Kaijookey
minions.ability: This minion has +1 power for each of your actions played on this base.

minions.name: Tiny Priestesses
minions.ability: Play or move Gorgodzolla to here.

minions.name: Johnny
minions.ability: You may return one of your actions on a base to your hand and play it here as an extra action.

actions.name: The Folly of Men
actions.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions and actions here cannot be destroyed by other players' cards. You gain +2 power here.

actions.name: Kaiju Alliance
actions.ability: Reduce the breakpoint of all bases by 4 until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Kaiju Conflict
actions.ability: Play two extra actions.

actions.name: Oh, No!
actions.ability: Play on a base. Play or move Gorgodzolla to here. Ongoing: You gain +2 power here.

actions.name: Pick Up A Bus
actions.ability: Choose an action in your discard pile that can be played on a base and place it into your hand.

actions.name: Radioactive Breath
actions.ability: Play on a base. Destroy all minions you don't control here of power 2 or less. Ongoing: You gain +3 power here.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.ability: Play on a base. Reduce its breakpoint by 3 until the end of the turn. Ongoing: You gain +2 power here.

actions.name: Tail Smash
actions.ability: Play on a base. Destroy a minion you don't control here of power 3 or less. Ongoing: You gain +4 power here.

actions.name: There Goes Tokyo
actions.ability: If Gorgodzolla is in play, destroy its base and all other cards on it. Move Gorgodzolla to another base and replace the destroyed base normally.

actions.name: They Say He's Got to Go
actions.ability: Move a titan to another base.

actions.name: Wade Through the Buildings
actions.ability: Play on a base. Destroy all other players' actions on this base. Ongoing: You gain +4 power here.

titan.name: Gorgodzolla
titan.ability: Special: Instead of your regular minion play, you may play this card on a base where you have two or more actions. Ongoing: After you play an action or a minion on this base, place a +1 power counter on this card. Ongoing: After you play an action on this base, you may draw a card.

factions.title: Magical Girls
factions.description: Abilities that get better the more minions you have on the same base.

deck.description: Moonlight, dreams, love, and starshine! OMG, it's so kawaii!!!! The Magical Girls are undoubtedly cute, but they will surprise you with what they can do with their spells. And they work together as a team. Evil will have no chance against these girls.

minions.name: Lunar Captain
minions.ability: Talent: Choose a minion in your discard pile with power less than or equal to the number of your minions here, and place it into your hand.

minions.name: Sakura Warrior
minions.ability: Talent: Reduce a minion's power here by the number of your minions here until the start of your next turn.

minions.name: Technomagical Lass
minions.ability: Talent: Destroy a minion you don't control here with power less than or equal to the number of your minions here.

minions.name: Bewitching Gal
minions.ability: Talent: Reduce the breakpoint of this base by the number of your minions here until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Fancy Suit Lad
minions.ability: Ongoing: Your other minions here are not affected by other players' cards.

minions.name: Power Maid
minions.ability: Talent: Choose a minion with power less than or equal to the number of your minions here, and move it to or from here.

minions.name: Rainbow Girl
minions.ability: Your other minions here gain +1 power until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Black Magicat
minions.ability: Search your deck and/or discard pile for Lunar Captain and place it into your hand.

minions.name: White Magicat
minions.ability: Search your deck and/or discard pile for Power Maid and place it into your hand.

actions.name: Celestial Teleport
actions.ability: Move one of your minions to another base.

actions.name: Coordination
actions.ability: Play either an extra minion or Walking Castle.

actions.name: Coronet Attack
actions.ability: Destroy a minion you don't control with power less than or equal to the number of your minions at the same base.

actions.name: Kiss the Sky Spell
actions.ability: Place a minion from your discard pile into your hand. You may play an extra action this turn.

actions.name: Lunar Healing Love Spell
actions.ability: Choose a minion in each player's discard pile and place it into its owner's hand.

actions.name: Magical Staff
actions.ability: Play on your minion. Ongoing: This minion gains +1 power. When this minion goes to the discard pile, place it on top of your deck instead.

actions.name: Purge the Demon
actions.ability: Choose a card. Destroy an action on it, OR remove all counters on it.

actions.name: Silver Shard
actions.ability: All players shuffle all minions in their discard piles into their decks.

titan.name: Walking Castle
titan.ability: Special: Instead of your regular minion play, you may play this card on a base where you have at least two minions. Ongoing: Your minions here cannot be destroyed by other players' abilities. Talent: Move this titan and up to three of your minions here to another base.

factions.title: Mega Troopers
factions.description: Special abilities that can help you during the scoring of bases.

deck.description: Go go play on bases! Go go destroy minions! Go go Mega Troopers, You crazy Smash Up Mega Troopers! The Mega Troopers are the ultimate fighting team, snatching victory from the jaws of defeat. And should things get out of control, they can always call a giant frickin' robot and auto-win. Which they should probably just do earlier in the fight, but whatever.

minions.name: Red Trooper
minions.ability: Talent: Play or move Megabot to here.

minions.name: Blue Trooper
minions.ability: Special: Before this base scores, this minion gains +2 power until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Yellow Trooper
minions.ability: Special: Before this base scores, you may move another one of your minions to here.

minions.name: Black Trooper
minions.ability: Ongoing: After a special ability is used, this minion gains +1 power until the end of the turn.

minions.name: Green Trooper
minions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, you may play this minion there as an extra minion.

minions.name: Pink Trooper
minions.ability: Special: After this base scores, return one of your minions here of power 3 or less to your hand instead of the discard pile.

minions.name: Beta 6
minions.ability: Special: Before this base scores, this minion gains +1 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Blitzing Sword Attack
actions.ability: Special: Before a base scores where you have a titan, if you are not winning there, destroy a minion there of power 4 or less.

actions.name: Form Megabot!
actions.ability: Play or move Megabot to a base where you have at least two minions.

actions.name: It's Blitzin' Time!
actions.ability: One of your minions gains +3 power until the end of the turn.

actions.name: Lightning Crystal
actions.ability: Destroy an action on a base or on a minion.

actions.name: Lightning Rescue!
actions.ability: Special: Before a base scores, play an action as a special action.

actions.name: Mega Attack
actions.ability: Destroy a minion with power less than the total power of your minions here.

actions.name: Plan For More!
actions.ability: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Draw any minions revealed; you may play one of them as an extra minion. Return the rest in any order.

actions.name: Power Pose
actions.ability: Special: After a base scores where you were the winner, draw two cards.

titan.name: Megabot
titan.ability: Special: Instead of your regular minion play, you may play this card on a base where you have at least three minions. Ongoing: You have +1 power here for each of your minions here. Special: Before another base scores, you may move this titan to there.
